title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or Docker container.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list and delete models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same verbs as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama’s local models into LangChain LLM and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG via document uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, streaming, and custom timeout options.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, markdown rendering and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Vercel template showing how to build a RAG chatbot backed by Ollama + pgvector for embeddings storage.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector, PVC and HPA support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama with synchronous and asynchronous procedures plus Nim-style iterators for streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for CI pipelines to run local LLM tests.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Chat with notes” pane powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that proxies Slack threads to Ollama and streams answers back as threaded replies.
